title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: A French billionaire has donated more than $163 million towards rebuilding Notre Dame Cathedral, after a fire ripped through the medieval cathedral in April. Months of delays left French officials reliant on small charity contributions to fund the first phase of repairs, but according to authorities, the large donation will give the Notre Dame Foundation a massive financial boost. French president Emmanuel Macron hopes to complete the restoration within five years, but some experts believe that timeline is too ambitious. Image: AP
